snippet: A prosecution witness in John Edwards’s federal corruption trial called him “a pathetic little man” and “evil” in e-mails with another witness, testimony in the trial revealed.
abstract: John Edwards's former longtime speechwriter Wendy Button testifies as a prosecution witness in the former senator's federal corruption trial on conspiracy and campaign finance violations; recounts Edwards's decision to come clean about the child from his extramarital affair.
lead_paragraph: A prosecution witness in John Edwards’s federal corruption trial called him “a pathetic little man” and “evil” in e-mails with another witness, testimony in the trial revealed.

headline.main: Speechwriter Recounts Edwards’s Decision to Come Clean About Child From Affair
